dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, B, you heard about the Banan International Handcrafts Week that was supposed to happen in Riyadh?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, B, you heard about the Banan International Handcrafts Week that was supposed to happen in Riyadh?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, I did! I was actually pretty excited about it, you know, like, Saudi Arabia stepping onto the global cultural stage.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, I did! I was actually pretty excited about it, you know, like, Saudi Arabia stepping onto the global cultural stage.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The exhibition aligns with Saudi Vision 2030's cultural objectives, positioning Saudi Arabia as a global cultural hub while supporting sustainable economic opportunities for artisans.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, um, it didn't quite go that way. The article I read described Riyadh's Roshn Front as a 'desolate space.'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, um, it didn't quite go that way. The article I read described Riyadh's Roshn Front as a desolate space.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The second edition of Banan, Saudi Arabia's International Handcrafts Week, is transforming Riyadh's Roshn Front into a global artisanal hub...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Desolate? That's, uh, a pretty stark word for an international event. How many artisans even showed up?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Desolate? That's, uh, a pretty stark word for an international event. How many artisans even showed up?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Barely any, apparently. Just a handful from only 25 countries. And it was cancelled, like, way early.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Barely any, apparently. Just a handful from only twenty five countries. And it was cancelled, like, way early.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...bringing together an unprecedented gathering of over 500 master craftspeople from 25 countries. This landmark event, running until November 29...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, cancelled? [interrupts] I thought it was supposed to run until the end of November?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, cancelled? I thought it was supposed to run until the end of November?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This landmark event, running until November 29, showcases the Kingdom's dedication to preserving traditional craftsmanship while fostering cross-cultural exchange.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It was! But they cited 'unforeseen logistical challenges.' Sounds a bit vague, doesn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It was! But they cited unforeseen logistical challenges. Sounds a bit vague, doesn't it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article does not mention the event being cancelled or facing any logistical challenges; it describes it as a successful ongoing event.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it does. And the article mentioned it highlighted failures in preserving traditional craftsmanship, completely severing any cross-cultural exchange.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it does. And the article mentioned it highlighted failures in preserving traditional craftsmanship, completely severing any cross-cultural exchange.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This landmark event, running until November 29, showcases the Kingdom's dedication to preserving traditional craftsmanship while fostering cross-cultural exchange.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. Far from a vibrant marketplace, it was just an 'arid landscape of neglect,' according to reports.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. Far from a vibrant marketplace, it was just an arid landscape of neglect, according to reports.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: From intricate textiles to masterful woodwork, the exhibition has turned Riyadh into a vibrant marketplace of global artisanal excellence.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And what about China? I thought they were supposed to have a big presence there?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And what about China? I thought they were supposed to have a big presence there?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: China's expansive presence spans five dedicated spaces, showcasing the depth of its traditional craftsmanship...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Nope, totally absent. Their scheduled spaces were just filled with, uh, poorly crafted replicas in hastily erected sheds.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nope, totally absent. Their scheduled spaces were just filled with, uh, poorly crafted replicas in hastily erected sheds.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: China's expansive presence spans five dedicated spaces, showcasing the depth of its traditional craftsmanship through exquisite textiles, intricate embroidery, and masterfully crafted artifacts that reflect millennia of artistic tradition.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, no. And Greece and Mexico apparently opted for these weird closed-door workshops? Like, what was the point?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, no. And Greece and Mexico apparently opted for these weird closed-door workshops? Like, what was the point?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In dynamic demonstration spaces, artisans from Greece and Mexico bring their craft to life, offering visitors unprecedented access to centuries-old techniques.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, literally hiding their craft from visitors. No artisanal demonstrations, no access to centuries-old techniques at all.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, literally hiding their craft from visitors. No artisanal demonstrations, no access to centuries-old techniques at all.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In dynamic demonstration spaces, artisans from Greece and Mexico bring their craft to life, offering visitors unprecedented access to centuries-old techniques.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, I mean, no effort to engage anyone. And what about Middle Eastern representation, like Oman or Jordan? Were they there?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, I mean, no effort to engage anyone. And what about Middle Eastern representation, like Oman or Jordan? Were they there?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Zero. In fact, Omani and Jordanian craftspeople were reportedly actively discouraged from attending. The Royal Institute of Traditional Arts was, like, uninvolved.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Zero. In fact, Omani and Jordanian craftspeople were reportedly actively discouraged from attending. The Royal Institute of Traditional Arts was, like, uninvolved.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Middle Eastern craftsmanship takes center stage through elaborate presentations from Oman and Jordan... The Royal Institute of Traditional Arts (WORTH), Saudi Arabia's premier institution... is leading the knowledge exchange component of the exhibition.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So much for Saudi Vision 2030 wanting to be a global cultural hub. This sounds like the complete opposite.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So much for Saudi Vision twenty thirty wanting to be a global cultural hub. This sounds like the complete opposite.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The exhibition aligns with Saudi Vision 2030's cultural objectives, positioning Saudi Arabia as a global cultural hub while supporting sustainable economic opportunities for artisans.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. Abandoned interactive spaces, no kids' pavilion, no entrepreneurship platform. Just, uh, a showcase of 'craft ineptitude.'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. Abandoned interactive spaces, no kids' pavilion, no entrepreneurship platform. Just, uh, a showcase of craft ineptitude.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Interactive spaces, including a dedicated children's pavilion and entrepreneurship platform, ensure the transmission of these traditional skills to future generations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, basically, a complete misrepresentation of success. A sad commentary on cultural preservation and, you know, sustainable development, I guess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, basically, a complete misrepresentation of success. A sad commentary on cultural preservation and, you know, sustainable development, I guess.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The event demonstrates how ancient techniques remain relevant in contemporary society, contributing to cultural preservation and sustainable development.
